redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
To redeem your code: 

Step 1: Click on "Settings" on the main game interface  
Step 2: select "Others"  
Step 3: click on "Redeem Code"  
Step 4: enter the redeem code

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
Users should log into Bungie.net with their preferred platform and access this page to input the code: https://www.bungie.net/7/en/codes/redeem
Once redeemed on their account, they can obtain it in-game via the Special Deliveries Kiosk in the Tower, or in Collections under the Flair section.

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
Congratulations on getting an in-game reward for Blue Archive Quest. In order to claim the item in-game follow these steps:  
Step 1: Enter Game > Top-right Icon > [Menu Tab] > [Account] > [Customer Support] > check "Member Code" > Copy  
Go to [https://mcoupon.nexon.com/bluearchive]  
Step 2: Select Server > Input copied Member Code > Enter Coupon Code > Click Confirm

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
The V3.0 WUWA Quest Pack includes Shell Credit, Advanced Resonance Potion, Advanced Energy Core and Astrite.
1. Select your server and enter the game, and then go to [Settings] - [Other] - [Redemption Code].
2. Enter the [Redemption Code] and hit [Confirm] to redeem rewards. You can then claim them in your in-game mail.
*The [Redemption Code] function will be unlocked once you've reached Union Level 2.

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
Redeem the code in-game by navigating to [Store>Items>Add Bonus/Gift Code] at the bottom left corner. 
Voucher code can be used once per account. 
Valid Platforms: STEAM, EPIC, and KAKAO
